messages.install: <center>Thanks for installing the DNS Techpack for Minecraft 1.10.2! Have fun!</center>
messages.update: Please read the changelog, or you may lose some of your things. Otherwise, have fun!

warnings.warning:
Sponge is currently in a BETA state.

When reporting an issue you must state that you are using sponge!

TechReborn changes the recipes of items from other mods.

This mod is very similar to old GregTech and is not for the faint-hearted.

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Core modding API used for the majority of mods.

mod.name: DNS Menu Resources
mod.description: DNS Techpack Resources

mod.name: DNS Loading Screen
mod.description: Small resource pack for DNS

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Bookshelf is a core/library mod, which adds new features and tools into the game for other content creators to work with. The primary focus of this project is to make use of the combined strength of the modded community to create wonderful tools that everyone can use.

mod.name: Brandon's Core
mod.description: This is the core mod that will be used by most of my mods from now on

mod.name: Chameleon
mod.description: Shared code and render support for mods. Used by jaquadro's mods.

mod.name: Code Chicken Core
mod.description: Core mod / library for ChickenBones' mods.

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Core mod / library for ChickenBones' mods.

mod.name: ElecCore | Rendering Library
mod.description: Shared code for Forge mods

mod.name: EnderCore
mod.description: Library mod used by EnderIO, EnderZoo, and others

mod.name: MalisisCore
mod.description: MalisisCore is a framework dedicated to simplify many processes required during a mod development.

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: MCMultiPart
mod.description: A universal multipart API for MC 1.8.9

mod.name: SonarCore
mod.description: Sonar's Modding Framework

mod.name: TESLA
mod.description: A modern power API

mod.name: ThutCore
mod.description: API used by Thut's Mods

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: AppleSkin
mod.description: Adds various food-related HUD improvements

mod.name: Better Builder's Wands
mod.description: Wands that allow placing of multiple blocks at a time

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds over 50 new biomes, blocks, and more!

mod.name: Calculator
mod.description: Whoever said Calculators were boring?! Awesome Calculators, crazy items, mind-blowing machines and hundreds of hidden recipes. Change the way you craft, change the way you play, change the way you think. Thank you for trying Calculator!

mod.name: ChickenChunks
mod.description: Advanced chunkloading management Credits: Sanguine - Texture Supporters:

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Chisel: A New Hope. For 1.7 and 1.8!

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: Compact Solar Arrays
mod.description: Compact Solar Arrays, an Industrial Craft 2 mod that adds in three new Solar Panel type blocks: Solar Arrays. Solar Arrays condense 8 (Low Voltage), 64 (Medium Voltage) or 512 (High Voltage) Industrial Craft 2 solar panels into a single block. This significantly reduces the CPU impact of large amounts of Solar Energy gathering so is a common server enhancement. New in 4.0: Solar Hats- charge armor at the same rate as their block counterparts would

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mod.name: Crafting Tweaks
mod.description: Allows you to rotate or clear the crafting matrix by the press of a button, in any (supported) crafting window.

mod.name: CraftTweaker (MineTweaker 3)
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Dark Utilities
mod.description: A mod that adds a bunch of new utilities to the game.

mod.name: DeepResonance
mod.description: Power generation based on resonanting crystals

mod.name: Draconic Evolution
mod.description: This is a mod that was originally made for the Tolkiencraft mod pack but it has since evolved way beyond that. This mod adds a mot of extremely expensive ant powerful end game items as well as a lot of random useful bits and peaces.

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: Compact conduits, painted things and all sorts of stuff and bling.

mod.name: EnderStorage
mod.description: Stores your stuff in the END! Credits: Ecu - original idea, design, chest and pouch texture Rosethorns - tank model Soaryn - tank texture Supporters: Blkdragon112

mod.name: Extra Utilities 2
mod.description: A bunch of useful things.

mod.name: Fancy Fluid Storage
mod.description: A simple fluid storage mod that's gonna fancy up your world!

mod.name: Fast Leaf Decay
mod.description: Makes leave decay faster

mod.name: Flood Lights
mod.description: Adds flood lights to Minecraft

mod.name: Flux Networks
mod.description: Create Wireless Energy Networks

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: GenDustry
mod.description: Adds industrial apiaries, advanced genetic manipulation and mutation (Forestry addon)

mod.name: Graves Mod
mod.description: Provides grave stones with your items in it upon death

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: JEI Bees
mod.description: Adds JEI recipes that show breeding and products from Forestry bees, trees and butterflies.

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: MalisisSwitches
mod.description: Wireless Switches for Minecraft

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Mekanism is an independent tech mod that brings low, mid, and high tier machinery to Minecraft.

mod.name: Mod Tweaker 2
mod.description: ModTweaker is an addon for MineTweaker 3.

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool
mod.description: The wrench to end all wrenches.

mod.name: Not Enough Items
mod.description: Browse all items and blocks within the game, see crating recipes and access cheat and utility menus.

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: Ore Dictionary Converter
mod.description: Convert between different versions of the same ore using the Forge Ore Dictionary

mod.name: Quark
mod.description: Small things.

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: Router Reborn
mod.description: Bringing the router back to 1.8.9

mod.name: Solar Flux
mod.description: Solar Panels producing Redstone Flux

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Tesla Coils
mod.description: Tesla Coils is a simple mod for minecraft that adds Immersive Engineering inspired power transfer for Tesla power machines.

mod.name: Thut's Elevators
mod.description: Adds elevators to minecraft

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: Waila (What Am I Looking At) is a UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly ingame.

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: An add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at

mod.name: What Are We Looking At
mod.description: Greatly expands upon the amount of information provided by the Waila HUD, along with bridging support between Waila and many other minecraft mods!

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore. JourneyMap API: v1.9.4-1.2. Built: 2016-06-30-01:09:28.

mod.name: MapWriter
mod.description: An open source mini map mod

mod.name: VoxelMap
mod.description: Minimap and Worldmap. Have an overview of your surroundings, or view the entire world. Create waypoints.

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft.

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Psi
mod.description: Psionic SpellCasting Instruments

mod.name: RebornCore
mod.description: RebornCore, A core set of classes.

mod.name: Refined Storage
mod.description: A Minecraft mod all about storage.

mod.name: RFTools Dimensions
mod.description: RFTools Dimensions Addon

mod.name: TechReborn
mod.description: TechReborn, The Gregtech revival you dream about on a cool mid summer's eve.

mod.name: Pam's HarvestCraft
mod.description: Expanding minecraft's food system.

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.name: SpongeForge
mod.description: The Sponge API Implementation

mod.name: WorldEdit
mod.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single player and multiplayer.

mod.name: Chance Cubes
mod.description: A Game of Chance and Skill
